hero.title: Design Your
hero.subtitle: No more salon stress. No more flimsy press-ons. With NaiLit, you get fully custom, hand-painted, high-quality Gel-X press-on nails for every occasion.

designer.title: Custom Designer
designer.description: Mix and match colors, patterns, and finishes to create your unique style

share.title: Share & Save

premium.title: Premium Sets
premium.description: Order custom designs or choose from our curated nail art collections

about.title: About Us
about.tagline: NaiLit is here to make your nails lit and help you nail it! ‚ú®
about.intro: We believe that nails should be as unique as you are. That is why NaiLit offers fully customizable press-on nails designed with you in mind. Using our Nail Dress-Up system, you can choose your shape, length, color, and finish to create a set that is 100% your style.
about.craftmanship: Once you have submitted your design, our expert nail techs handcraft each set on authentic Gel-X bases. No 3D printing. No bulky plastic. Just the perfect balance of thinness, flexibility, and salon-quality feel combined with the convenience of press-ons.
about.safety: We are also proud to say that our products are Trimethylbenzoyl Diphenylphosphine Oxide (TPO)-free and fully compliant with EU safety standards. Beauty should never come at the cost of safety, and NaiLit is committed to giving you both.
about.adhesiveKit: 1x Nail Adhesive Kit (featuring both glue and sticker tabs, so you can choose between long-lasting hold or easy reuse)
about.removalKit: 1x Nail Removal Kit (so you can change up your look whenever you want, without damage)
about.confidence: With NaiLit, you do not just wear nails. You wear your style, your creativity, and your confidence.
about.motto: NaiLit. Nails made for you, by you. üíÖ
about.faqText: For Order and Shipping related questions, please see our

placeOrder.question: How do I place an order?
placeOrder.answer: Simply use our Nail Dress-Up system to design your set, add it to cart, and check out. Once your order is placed, our expert nail techs will start handcrafting your press-ons.

processTime.question: How long does it take to process my order?
processTime.answer: Because each set is custom-made, please allow 5‚Äì7 business days for production before shipping.

whereShip.question: Where do you ship?
whereShip.answer: We currently ship domestically within the United States and internationally to Italy, France, Canada, and Japan.

cost.question: How much is shipping?
cost.answer: Domestic shipping is a flat rate of $X. International shipping rates vary depending on destination and will be calculated at checkout.

acceptReturns.question: Do you accept returns?
acceptReturns.answer: Because each set is handcrafted and customized, we unfortunately cannot accept returns. If there is an issue with your order, please contact us and we will make it right.
